sentences.english: Walk the dog, brush your teeth, lay out clothing for the next day, and get into bed.
sentences.chinese: 溜，刷牙，准备妥当第二天的衣服后就去困觉。

sentences.english: I like sleeping with windows open at night.
sentences.chinese: 晚上我喜欢开着窗口困觉。

sentences.english: I would rather sleep than watch thellos movie.
sentences.chinese: 我情愿困觉也不看这部电影。

sentences.english: The only thing I could listen to falling asleep was the crickets' chirping.
sentences.chinese: 我困觉前独一能听见的就是蟋蟀的啼声。

sentences.english: I never got used to going to bed so early.
sentences.chinese: 我始末没能习气恁地早上床困觉。

sentences.english: I pretended to be asleep so mum wouldnt talk to me.
sentences.chinese: 我假装困觉如许我妈就不会絮聒了。

sentences.english: I want to go home to bed.
The room is too cold for me. I feel rather cold when Isleep.
sentences.chinese: 这房间太冷了，我困觉时感应很冷。

sentences.english: I will not go to bed until Ifinish drawing the picture tonight.
sentences.chinese: 今天晚上直到我画完画，我才上床困觉。

sentences.english: Swam: We should get some sleep too.

definition: to go to bed/(coll.) to have sex
(lit.) to lie stiff like a corpse/(coll.) to sleep
erhua variant of 被窩|被窝[bei4 wo1]
quilt wrapped around the body as a tube (traditional bedding)/(contemporary) bedding/quilt/blankets/cover/bed
